original_text: Then the king of Assyria sent his field commander with a large army from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem. When the commander stopped at the aqueduct of the Upper Pool, on the road to the Launderer’s Field,
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 라기스에서부터 랍사게를 예루살렘으로 보내되 대군을 거느리고 히스기야 왕에게로 가게 하매 그가 윗못 수도 곁 세탁자의 밭 큰 길에 서매

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Assyria sent his field commander
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 앗수르 왕이 그의 야전 사령관을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: with a large army from Lachish
at the aqueduct of the Upper Pool
on the road to the Launderer's Field
